title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: CONTROL OF STEM BORER IN RICE
INFORMATION REGARDING CONTROL OF SHEATH BLIGHT IN RICE CROP ?
records.KccAns:
SPRAY TILT 25EC @ 200ML OR BAVISTIN 50WP @ 200gm IN 200LITRES OF WATER/ACRE.THE 

FIRST SPRAY SHOULD BE GIVEN AT BOOT STAGE AND SECOND AFTER 15DAYS INTERVAL.
no chance of heavy rain in upcoming 48 hours.

records.QueryText: dhan me tana bhedak ki problem

records.KccAns: NO RAIN POSSIBILITY IN NEXT 5 DAYS

records.QueryText: CONTROL OF STEM BORER IN PADDY
records.KccAns: SPRAY ACEPHATE 75% SP @ 1.5 GM/2 LT. OF WATER
Spray M-45 30 gm/15 Lit of Water.

records.QueryText: loki ki pattiya ko kida kat raha he

records.KccAns: PLEASE CALL US AGAIN FOR YOUR PROBLEM

records.QueryText: TELL ME MANDI RATE OF GUAR
ASKING ABOUT THE CONTROL OF TERMITE ATTACK IN SUGARCANE FIELD
records.KccAns: ADVISED TO SPRAY TRICEL 20 EC @ 1.5 ML / LITRE OF WATER
SPRAY ACEPHATE 75 WP @ 1 GM PER LITRE OF WEATER AND CARBENDAZIM 50 WP @ 1 GM PER LITRE OF WATER.

records.QueryText: TELL ME CONTROL FLOWER DROPING OF LEMON.
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF PLANOFIX 1 ML PER 4 LITER WATER FOR CONTROL OF FLOWER DROPING

records.QueryText: TELL ME WEATHER CONDITION IN JODHPUR
records.KccAns: NO RAIN FALL POSSIBILITY  IN NEXT FIVE DAYS

records.QueryText: How to control fungial diseases/leaf curl in cotton crop ?
records.KccAns: 4-spray to plantomycin @ 30-40 gm OR  sterptrocychilin @ 6-8 gm + 600 gm c.o.c in 150-200 liter of water / acre .  in 10 days interval .

records.QueryText: REGARDING TO ATMA PROJECT AND FARMER PRIZE AWARD
lahi boi thi jami nahi hai
Cotton which is 1.5 months crop,the leaves are changing to reddish brown colour and then dropping.Sprayed Confidor chemical @ 1 ml/10 lts.of water.But it was not controlled?
records.KccAns: This is due to sucking pests damage.Spray Confidor chemical only @ 3-4 ml/lt.water or Monocrotophos @ 1.5 ml/lt.water.

"TERMITE CONTROL IN CHILLI USE CHLOROPYRIPHOSE 20% EC @ 4 LITER /HAC WITH IRRIGATION.
"

records.QueryText: SUBSIDY ON PIPE LINE FOR IRRIGATION
records.KccAns: SUBSIDY ON PIPE LINE 50% OF COST OR 15,000 RS MAXIMUM

records.QueryText: soler pump ke bare me jankari leni hain

records.KccAns: i sugg to monocrotophosh 12 ml/pump spray

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING ATTACK OF WHITE FLY ON COTTON
records.KccAns: FOR CONTROLLING WHITE FLY ON COTTON, SPRAY 80 GM ULALA OR 600 ML TRIAZOPHOS OR 800 ML ETHION 50 EC  IN 100 LITRES OF WATER

Dr. G. S. Kulmi
Programme Coordinator,
Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Raghogarh Naka, Post-Aron, Distt. Guna (M.P.)
PIN - 473101
Ph.: 07545-205360
Mob. : 9424418862

records.QueryText: How to control flower dropping in cotton crop ?
records.KccAns: 2 spray to NAA(planofix) @ 40-50 ml in 150-200 liter of water / acre .15 days interval

records.QueryText: how to control american catterpiller sundi in cotton crop ?
records.KccAns: spray quinalphos @ 800 ml in 200 litre of water/acre.
Mostly clear, no chance of rainfall.

records.QueryText: how to control fungal diseas in paddy ?
records.KccAns: spray of tilt @ 200 ml in 200 liter water/acre .

records.QueryText: ask for sucking pest in cotton

records.KccAns: 27,28 septambar ko baris ho sakti hai

records.QueryText: ASKING ABOUT FERTILIZERS USE IN PADDY.
INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CURRENT WEATHER CONDITION?
Information regarding how to control fungal disease in paddy?
records.KccAns: Spray 200 ml. Tilt in 200 lt. of water per acre.
IT IS SMS FASILTY OF RAIN

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING CHANCE OF RAIN FALL TODAY?
records.KccAns: NO CHANCE OF RAIN FALL TODAY.
SPRAY IMIDACHLOPRID 17.8 SL @2 GM PER LITRE OF WATER.

records.QueryText: How to control flower and fruit dropping ?
records.KccAns: Spray 1 ml. planofix per 4.5 lt. of water.

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CONTROL  OF WHITE BACKED PLANT HOPPER(W.P.H.) & BROWN PLANT HOPPER(B.P.H.) IN PADDY(JHONA) CROP?
records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL  OF WHITEBACKED PLANT HOPPER(W.P.H.) & BROWN PLANT HOPPER(B.P.H.) IN PADDY(JHONA) CROP,PLS SPRAY 350ML BUPROFEZIN+100 ML NUVAN IN 150LITRE WATER.
contact to block level ADA office

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING CONTROL OF STEMBORERS IN BASMATI RICE CROP ?
records.KccAns:
SPRAY OF CORAGEN 20 SC 60 ML  OR 560ML MONOCIL 36SL (MONOCROTOPHOS) OR ONE LITRE 

OF COROBAN/DURSBAN/LETHAL/CHLORGUARD/DURMET 20EC (CHLORPYRIPHOS) OR I5 GM 

FIPRONIL 80% WG OR IN 100LITRES OF WATER/ACRE.

records.QueryText: top dressing fertilizer management for  maize
HOW TO CONTROL WHITE FLY IN SUGARCANE CROP ?
records.KccAns: SPRAY ROGOR @ 600 ML IN 400 LITRE OF WATER/ACRE.

records.QueryText: TELL ME SUBSIDY ON FARM POND
Information regarding how to control white fly ,leaf curl in cotton?
records.KccAns:
Information regarding how to control white fly ,leaf curl in cotton?
Spray 300 ml. rogor + 1 lt. nimbecidine in 200 lt. of water per acre.

records.QueryText: TELL ME ABOUT PEST IN GUAR
records.KccAns: SPRAY OF ACIPHATE 75 % SP @ 2 GRAM /LITER WATER

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING CONTROL OF FLOWER DROPING IN COTTON?
records.KccAns: SPRAY POTASSIUM NITRATE  (13:0:45)@ 2 KG IN 100 LITERS OF WATER/ACRE.
24 se 28 septambar tak baris ki sambhavna hai

records.QueryText: CONTROL OF FLOWER DROP IN POINTED GOURD.
records.KccAns: SPRAY ALPHA NAA @ 1 ML/ 4.5 LIT. OF WATER.

records.QueryText: how to control of kala cheepa in paddy crop  ?
records.KccAns: spray of methail parathion @ 600 ml /200 liter water/acre .
APPLY COPPER HYROXIDE @ 2 GM/ LIT OF WATER

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING ATTACK OF WHITE FLY ON COTTON
records.KccAns: FOR CONTROLLING WHITE FLY ON COTTON, SPRAY 80 GM ULALA OR 600 ML TRIAZOPHOS OR 800 ML ETHION 50 EC  IN 100 LITRES OF WATER

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CONTROL  OF WHITE BACKED PLANT HOPPER(W.P.H.) & BROWN PLANT HOPPER(B.P.H.) IN PADDY(JHONA) CROP?
records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL  OF WHITEBACKED PLANT HOPPER(W.P.H.) & BROWN PLANT HOPPER(B.P.H.) IN PADDY(JHONA) CROP,PLS SPRAY 350ML BUPROFEZIN+100 ML NUVAN IN 150LITRE WATER.
